name: MHTOCSMMAirAndThromboticEmbolism
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Air and Thrombotic Embolism Indicator
description: A ValueSet comprised of ICD-10-CM and ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes for the Severe Maternal Morbidity Air and Thrombotic Embolism Indicator. The codes in the ValueSet should be monitored for changes as they vary by source and may be updated.
